description: Amendments to planning permission dated 30th September 2020 (RN: 19/09329/COFUL) for demolition of existing structures including storage sheds and redevelopment of existing car park to provide two blocks of three and five storeys providing a total of 21 x Use Class C3 (residential) units and other associated works, including the provision of storage units, car and cycle parking, landscaping, access gates and boundary treatment. Namely, the installation of air bricks, raising of window transoms to all windows, reduction in size of mansard rooflights, raising of parapets around the top of the apartment building by 200mm, introduction of mechanical opening to windows, reduction in number of storage units to allow an increase in size, replacement of low level wall with railings at ground floor level at the rear of the block of flats, reconstruction of the vehicle crossover and amendment to the approved tenure mix from 8 x intermediate units to 8 x social rented units.
